name: Responsive Design Tester
description: This app is designed to help users see how their web pages look on different devices by previewing URLs in various screen resolutions. With a sidebar for quick access to mobile, desktop, and tablet options, it offers a straightforward way to switch between device views. Simply input a URL, choose a device, and watch the app adjust to show the selected screen size. Featuring a sticky URL input area and smooth scrolling, this tool enhances the user experience by making responsive design testing seamless and efficient.
